products.name: Legal Premiums
products.description:
Legal Premiums is insurance companies review website.
Our team used PHP, Laravel 9 for the backend development, Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS for the admin dashboard.
On the Frontend, Tailwind CSS, HTMl5 and JavaScript.
The team was able to collaborate effortlessly because project deliverables were monitored using Git.
products.outcome: In the end the project was completed and we delivered it to our client.

products.name: InfoSourceHub
products.description:
Info Source Hub is a news website developed using PHP and WordPress.
Our team designed and created WordPress theme the powers the website.
On the Front-End part we were able to achieve the elegant design by use of Bootstrap CSS along with custom CSS3.
products.outcome: So far we have received positive feedback from the client, we are still working on some features like login and register.

products.name: Quick Shoppers
products.description:
Quick Shoppers is an online shopping website that we build using Laravel 8, Vue.js 3, with API integration, HTML5, Bootstrap 5 & CSS3, JavaScript & jQuery, CSS, MySQL for storage of data, HTTP URL routing and integrated payment methods using most up to date frameworks.
Git version control really played a big part in the collaboration of our team.
products.outcome: The project was a big one, with a number of revisions and updates from our client, but eventually we were able to finish the project with satisfactory outcome.

products.name: LancerCommunity
products.description:
LancerCommunity is a freelance reviewing platform that gives users of different freelancing companies the opportunity to post their views on the quality of services received from the freelancing company.
We used Laravel for the backend development, and Tailwind CSS for the admin dashboard
On the Frontend, Bootstrap 5 was used with JavaScript.
The project deliverables were sent to the remote via Git.
products.outcome: We were able to complete the project after following all the instructions that our client had given us.

products.name: Celebrities Nation
products.description:
We achieved desired outcome this project using Laravel 9, PHP as the Backend tech stack. On the Frontend we used Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML5.
We also utilized Git Version control for the purposes of collaboration on the project.
products.outcome: The project was successful, our team was able to accomplish the project requirements.

products.name: OnlineServicesLab
products.description:
Website for news & blogging developed using core PHP & WordPress, CSS3, Bootstrap CSS, HTML5, jQuery and JavaScript.
We used Git for the purpose of collaboration and deployment of the project.
products.outcome: The project was successful, our team was able to accomplish the project requirements.

products.name: Workpar
products.description:
Workpar is freelancing website accessing by HTTP protocol. Website Development the website was achieved using CodeIgniter and PHP, JavaScript & jQuery, CSS3 and Git.
Modern design principles was followed on the Frontend UI CSS styling with optimized SEO.
products.outcome: The project was completed as per the client's specifications and we were able to close the project in time.

products.name: SuperiorWebDesigners
products.description:
The project was build using PHP, WordPress, CSS, HTML, jQuery for homepage animation.
We also applied our website development skills on HTTP url rewriting and CSS3 stylings of the website.
products.outcome: The project was well organized as per the clients description, we completed the job in time.

products.name: Foregoal
products.description:
• Foregoal is a fantacy football predictions website.
•Website Development adopted use of PHP Laravel framework version 5 on the backend, HTTP, and GIT version control for tracking and deploying changes.
For storage MySQL was used.
•Used Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery on the frontend.
•Used HTML, CSS, and CSS3 with JavaScript for navigation actions
products.outcome: Successfully delivered a wonderful football predictions website to the client.

products.name: BidSawa
products.description:
•Developed a biding E-Commerce Website that allows people to bid on available products.
•Used PHP, Laravel 7 in the development of the application and used Vue.js, HTML, CSS3, and JavaScript
with jQuery on the front end with Bootstrap version 4 in helping us achieve the elegant stylings on the
frontend. We use Git for collaboration and deployment of the project to live server.
•Managed the complete software development process from conception to deployment.
•Responsible for maintaining and upgrading the software following deployment.
•Managed the end-to-end life cycle for the production of the application.
•Responsible for overseeing and guiding the analyzing, writing, building, and deployment of software.
• The website was well optimized in terms of SEO as we followed best Search Engine Optimization practices.
products.outcome: Successfully delivered a wonderful football predictions website to the client.
